dublin_core.dcvalue: In our research on brain function analysis users require two different simultaneous types of processing interactive processing to a specific part of data and high performance batch processing to an entire dataset The difference between these two types of processing is in whether or not the analysis is for data in the region of interest ROI In this study we propose a Grid portal that has a mechanism to freely assign computing resources to the users on a Grid environment according to the users two different types of processing requirements
A framework supporting the development of a Grid portal for analysis based on ROI.
